Quick search

Notes on Silicon¶

Existing potentials

Keating [Kea66]

Tersoff [Ter86], [Ter88]

Stillinger and Weber [SW85]

Baskes, Nelson and Wright [BNW89] is an EAM potential.

Chelikowsky et al [CPKS89]

Biswas and Hammann [BH86]

Bazant, Kaxiras, and Justo [BKJ97]

Justo, Bazant, Kaxiras, Bulatov, Yip [JBK+98]

Vink, Barkema, Weg, Mousseau [VBVdWM01] is a stillinger-Weber potential fit to amorphous silicon.

BNW89

MI Baskes, JS Nelson, and AF Wright. Semiempirical modified embedded-atom potentials for silicon and germanium. Physical Review B, 40(9):6085, 1989.

BKJ97

Martin Z Bazant, Efthimios Kaxiras, and Joao F Justo. Environment-dependent interatomic potential for bulk silicon. Physical Review B, 56(14):8542, 1997.

BH86

R Biswas and DR Hamann. Simulated annealing of silicon atom clusters in langevin molecular dynamics. Physical Review B, 34(2):895, 1986.

CPKS89

James R Chelikowsky, JC Phillips, M Kamal, and M Strauss. Surface and thermodynamic interatomic force fields for silicon clusters and bulk phases. Physical review letters, 62(3):292, 1989.

JBK+98

Joao F Justo, Martin Z Bazant, Efthimios Kaxiras, Vasily V Bulatov, and Sidney Yip. Interatomic potential for silicon defects and disordered phases. Physical review B, 58(5):2539, 1998.

Kea66

PN Keating. Effect of invariance requirements on the elastic strain energy of crystals with application to the diamond structure. Physical Review, 145(2):637, 1966.

SW85

Frank H Stillinger and Thomas A Weber. Computer simulation of local order in condensed phases of silicon. Physical review B, 31(8):5262, 1985.

Ter86

J Tersoff. New empirical model for the structural properties of silicon. Physical review letters, 56(6):632, 1986.

Ter88

J Tersoff. Empirical interatomic potential for silicon with improved elastic properties. Physical Review B, 38(14):9902, 1988.

VBVdWM01

RLC Vink, GT Barkema, WF Van der Weg, and Normand Mousseau. Fitting the stillinger–weber potential to amorphous silicon. Journal of non-crystalline solids, 282(2-3):248–255, 2001. URL: https://doi.org/10.1016/S0022-3093(01)00342-8, doi:10.1016/S0022-3093(01)00342-8.
